mapper.select: select to_char(bill_timestamp, 'mm') as label , sum(bill_price) as sumPrice from bill where userid = #{userid} and to_char(bill_timestamp, 'yyyy') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') group by to_char(bill_timestamp, 'mm') order by label
select bill_category label, sum(bill_price) sumPrice from bill where userid = #{userid} group by bill_category order by bill_category
